ProductServiceCampaignItem.name: ProductServiceCampaignItem
ProductServiceCampaignItem.description: Represents an item, such as an asset or a serialized product, that’s included in a product service campaign.

ActionableListMemberId.description: The actionable list member that’s associated with an asset in a product service campaign.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the product service campaign item.

GeneratedTargetRecordType.description: Specifies the type of the target records that are generated for the product service campaign item.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Product2Id.description: The product associated with the product service campaign item.

ProductServiceCampaignId.description: The product service campaign that includes the product service campaign item.

ProductServiceCampaignItemNumber.description: The unique identifier of the product service campaign item.

SerializedProductId.description: The serialized product associated with the product service campaign item.

Status.description: The status of the product service campaign item.

StatusCategory.description: The category for a status value.
